item.title: 马斯克要求OpenAI和微软赔偿高达1340亿美元
item.description: 埃隆·马斯克要求OpenAI公司和微软向其支付790亿至1340亿美元的赔偿金，理由是这家生成式人工智能公司背弃非营利初衷并与软件巨头合作，构成对其欺诈。【原文：Elon Musk wants OpenAI Inc. and Microsoft to pay him damages in the range of $79 billion to $134 billion over his claims that the generative AI company defrauded him by abandoning its nonprofit roots and partnering with the software giant.】

item.title: 印度将根据判决结果开始向老虎环球基金追缴税款
item.description: 印度最高法院就老虎环球基金2018年出售在线零售商Flipkart股权案作出裁决后，印度政府将重启对该基金的税务诉讼程序。【原文：India will revive tax proceedings against Tiger Global Management after a top court ruling related to the firm’s 2018 sale of its stake in online retailer Flipkart.】

item.title: 2025年中国用电量将达美国两倍：央视报道
item.description: 据中国中央电视台周六援引国家能源局数据报道，2025年中国用电量已超过美国的两倍。【原文：China used more than double the electricity of the US in 2025, China Central Television reported Saturday, citing data from the National Energy Administration.】

item.title: 中国去年因腐败问题惩处69名高级官员
item.description: 中央纪律检查委员会、国家监察委员会网站周六发布的公告显示，去年中国在持续开展的反腐行动中，共惩处69名部级、省级及以上官员。【原文：China punished 69 officials at the level of minister, provincial rank and above last year for corruption amid an ongoing crackdown, according to a statement posted Saturday on the website of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and the National Supervisory Commission.】

item.title: Capital A完成向亚航X出售航空业务
item.description: 马来西亚Capital A公司宣布已完成将其短途航空业务出售给亚航X公司的交易，此举是托尼·费南德斯掌控的商业帝国重组计划的一部分。【原文：Malaysia’s Capital A Bhd. said it completed the sale of its short-haul aviation business to AirAsia X Bhd., as part of the restructuring of the business empire controlled by Tony Fernandes.】

item.title: 卢特尼克警告称，除非在美投资，否则部分韩国和台湾企业可能面临100%的芯片关税
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德·卢特尼克表示，除非韩国内存芯片制造商和台湾企业承诺增加在美国本土的生产，否则可能面临高达100%的关税。随着特朗普政府加大呼吁外国增加投资的力度，这些企业若不投资美国，将面临高额关税。【原文：Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said South Korean memory chipmakers and Taiwanese companies that aren’t investing in the US may face up to 100% tariffs unless they commit to increased production on American soil, as the Trump administration ramps up calls for additional foreign investment.】

item.title: 每日新闻报道：高市商讨暂停征收食品消费税
item.description: 据《每日新闻》援引知情人士消息报道，日本首相高市早苗计划在下周解散国会后，将食品消费税的临时免征纳入其竞选承诺。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi will consider a temporary suspension of sales tax on food as part of her election campaign pledge after her expected dissolution of parliament next week, Mainichi newspaper reported, citing unnamed people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: H&F正探讨以逾90亿美元出售医疗器械制造商柯迪斯
item.description: 知情人士透露，Hellman & Friedman正考虑出售医疗器械公司Cordis。【原文：Hellman & Friedman is exploring a potential sale of medical device company Cordis, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 7月股票期权获SEC批准，将于周一、周三到期
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会已批准七大蓝筹股期权的新到期日，此举使美国市场距离实现单只股票期权的每日到期又近了一步。【原文：The Securities and Exchange Commission has approved new expirations for Magnificent Seven stocks, moving the US market a step closer to daily expiries in single stock options.】

item.title: 爱迪生公司因火灾延迟警报致人死亡起诉洛杉矶县
item.description: 爱迪生国际公司起诉洛杉矶县及其他公共机构，指控其未能确保及时发布疏散警报。该公司称，若及时发布警报，去年那场大规模野火中丧生的19人中，多数本可获救。【原文：Edison International sued Los Angeles County and other public agencies for allegedly failing to ensure timely evacuation alerts that the company says could have saved most of the 19 people who died in a massive wildfire last year.】

item.title: 比利时免疫系统药物制造商AgomAb申请在美国首次公开募股
item.description: AgomAb Therapeutics NV公司已在美国提交首次公开募股申请，旨在为其治疗免疫和炎症疾病的药物临床试验筹集资金。【原文：AgomAb Therapeutics NV filed for a initial public offering in the US to help fund trials of its drugs to treat immune and inflammation diseases.】

item.title: 高市贸易面临通胀、日元暴跌、收益率飙升的三重风险
item.description: 日本首相高市早苗宣布提前大选的计划引发股市飙升，但若其如愿以偿，这波涨势可能消退——过度支出将推高通胀和政府借贷成本。【原文：The surge in Japanese stocks, triggered by Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s snap election plans, may fade if she gets what she wants, as overspending drives up inflation and government borrowing costs.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉签署首份天然气出口协议，称涉及液化石油气合同
item.description: 委内瑞拉代理总统德尔西·罗德里格斯周五宣布，该国已签署首份液化石油气出口合同。【原文：Venezuela has signed its first contract to export liquefied petroleum gas, or LPG, Acting President Delcy Rodríguez said Friday.】

item.title: 谷歌将就美国法院关于其搜索业务构成非法垄断的裁决提起上诉
item.description: 谷歌母公司Alphabet正就一项具有里程碑意义的反垄断裁决提起上诉，该裁决认定该公司非法垄断了在线搜索和搜索广告市场。此举在意料之中，很可能推迟该公司业务调整方案的实施。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google is appealing a landmark antitrust decision that the company illegally monopolized online search and search advertising, an expected move that will likely delay the implementation of changes to the company’s business.】

item.title: AIX Ventures联合创始人肖恩·约翰逊离职
item.description: AIX Ventures——这家曾投资过Perplexity、Windsurf和Ideogram等人工智能初创企业的风险投资公司——上月迎来联合创始人肖恩·约翰逊离职。【原文：AIX Ventures — a venture capital firm that has backed artificial intelligence startups including Perplexity, Windsurf and Ideogram — saw co-founder Shaun Johnson exit the firm last month.】

item.title: 化工企业Trinseo为债务谈判做准备，因需求疲软
item.description: 特瑞斯科公司正准备与债权人展开谈判，这家化工企业正试图在销售额下滑之际巩固其资产负债表。【原文：Trinseo PLC is preparing to start negotiations with its creditors as the chemical company seeks to shore up its balance sheet amid slumping sales.】

item.title: 国防企业约克太空系统公司寻求在美国IPO募资5.44亿美元
item.description: 由AE工业合伙公司支持的航天与国防企业约克太空系统公司正寻求通过首次公开募股筹集高达5.44亿美元资金。【原文：York Space Systems Inc., a space and defense firm backed by AE Industrial Partners, is seeking to raise as much as $544 million in an initial public offering.】

item.title: 美国最大电网公布保障可靠性的备用方案
item.description: 美国最大电网运营商PJM互联公司提出一项提案，拟采取后备措施以保障电网可靠性。【原文：PJM Interconnection LLC, operator of the largest US power grid, unveiled a proposal to take backstop measures to help support reliability.】

item.title: 对冲基金大幅削减白银看涨押注，降至22个月低点
item.description: 在白宫决定不对包括白银在内的关键矿物征收进口关税之前，基金经理大幅削减了对白银的看涨押注，降至近两年来的最低水平。【原文：Money managers slashed their bullish wagers on silver to the lowest in nearly two years before the White House refrained from putting import tariffs on critical minerals that include the white metal.】

item.title: 对冲基金对布伦特原油转为更乐观，因伊朗风险持续发酵
item.description: 对冲基金对布伦特原油的看涨情绪升至4月以来最高水平，因欧佩克第四大产油国伊朗局势动荡，使原油价格中的风险溢价再度回升。【原文：Hedge funds turned the most bullish on Brent oil since April as unrest in Iran, OPEC’s fourth-biggest producer, revived risk premium in crude prices.】

item.title: 华尔街为特朗普推进颠覆性议程开绿灯
item.description: 新年伊始数周内，政治格局的变动曾一度可能引发全球市场动荡。一位外国领导人被捕，司法部对美联储展开调查，而白宫更以颠覆性手段干预了美国商业领域的新版图。【原文：In the first weeks of the year, the political landscape has shifted in ways that once might have rattled global markets. A foreign leader was captured. The Department of Justice opened a probe into the Federal Reserve. And a disruptive White House intervened across fresh swaths of US commerce.】

item.title: 对冲基金罗斯康芒分析公司关闭美国天然气交易部门
item.description: 知情人士透露，对冲基金罗斯康芒分析公司正计划关闭其天然气交易业务，此前该公司在能源市场遭受了损失。【原文：Hedge fund Roscommon Analytics is moving to close its gas trading business following losses in the energy market, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 专注眼科护理的生物制药公司SpyGlass提交美国IPO申请
item.description: SpyGlass Pharma公司提交首次公开募股申请，旨在为其治疗青光眼等慢性眼疾的玻璃体腔内人工晶体及药物输送解决方案的后期临床试验筹集资金。【原文：SpyGlass Pharma Inc. filed for an initial public offering to help fund late-stage trials of its intraocular lens and drug delivery solutions to treat patients with chronic eye conditions such as glaucoma.】

item.title: 惠誉上调玻利维亚评级，因违约及重组风险降低
item.description: 惠誉评级上调了玻利维亚的信用评级，理由是新政府在获取新资金和削减开支方面取得进展，降低了违约风险。【原文：Bolivia’s credit rating was raised by Fitch Ratings, citing lower risks of a default given the new government’s progress in accessing new funds and cutting spending.】

item.title: 前通用催化剂负责人博纳索斯瞄准3亿美元新基金
item.description:
尼科·博纳佐斯和迈克尔·费蒂克正在为一家名为Verdict Capital的新公司筹集资金。

【原文：

Niko Bonatsos and Michael Fertik are raising cash for a new firm called Verdict Capital.

】

item.title: 佛罗里达州Brightline公司跳过次级市政债券的第二次付款
item.description: 由堡垒投资集团支持的佛罗里达州Brightline列车公司，未能支付12亿美元次级市政债券的第二期利息。【原文：Brightline Trains Florida, the Fortress Investment Group-backed passenger railroad, skipped its second interest payment on $1.2 billion of subordinate municipal bonds.】

item.title: 电力工程公司Solv Energy申请在美国上市
item.description: 能源基础设施服务公司Solv Energy Inc.提交了首次公开募股申请，成为最新一批借数据中心日益增长的电力需求获利的企业之一。【原文：Energy infrastructure services firm Solv Energy Inc. filed for an initial public offering, becoming one of the latest companies to capitalize on data centers’ increasing power needs.】

item.title: 迈克·梅奥在道富集团财报电话会议上火力全开
item.description: 分析师迈克·梅奥敦促道富集团管理层阐明其战略。【原文：Analyst Mike Mayo pressed State Street management to spell out its strategy.】

item.title: 谷歌正与Stonepeak旗下的Radiate公司就光纤资产合资项目进行谈判
item.description: 谷歌母公司Alphabet正与石峰资本支持的宽带运营商Radiate洽谈，拟成立合资企业整合双方光纤资产。随着人工智能等数据密集型应用的激增，高速网络连接需求正持续攀升。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google is in talks with Radiate, a broadband operator backed by Stonepeak Partners, to set up a joint venture that would hold the companies’ fiber assets, as demand for high-speed connectivity soars amid the surge in AI and other data-intensive applications.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉债权人集团据称考虑聘请财务顾问
item.description: 据知情人士透露，持有委内瑞拉债券的一批私人债权人已启动聘请财务顾问的程序，以加速推进600亿美元债务重组计划。【原文：A group of private creditors holding Venezuela bonds has started the process to hire a financial adviser as it ramps up efforts to kick off a $60 billion debt restructuring, according to people familiar with the matter.】
